statements: UPDATE Artists SET artist_name = 'Vincent van Gogh' WHERE artist_id = 1;
UPDATE Artists SET artwork_title = 'Starry Night', artwork_price = 1000.50 WHERE artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
UPDATE Artists SET artist_name = 'Pablo Picasso', artwork_year = 1937, artwork_price = 25000.00 WHERE artist_id = 1;
UPDATE Artists SET artwork_title = 'Starry Night', artist_style = 'Post-Impressionism', artwork_medium = 'Oil on Canvas' WHERE artist_id = 2;
UPDATE Artists SET country='USA' WHERE artist_id=1;
UPDATE Artworks SET price=5000.75, year_created=2022 WHERE artwork_id=1;
UPDATE Artists SET birthdate = '1990-05-15' WHERE artist_name = 'Vincent Van Gogh';
UPDATE Artworks SET medium = 'Oil on Canvas', price = 1500 WHERE artwork_id = 101;
UPDATE Artists SET biography = 'Renowned artist with a unique style' WHERE artist_id = 1;
UPDATE Artworks SET price = 500.00, creation_year = 2022 WHERE artwork_id = 3;
UPDATE Artists SET biography='Renowned artist with over 20 years of experience in the art world' WHERE artist_id=101
UPDATE Artworks SET price=5000.00, medium='Oil on Canvas' WHERE artist_id=105 AND creation_year=2020
UPDATE Artists SET artist_name = 'Vincent Van Gogh', country = 'Netherlands' WHERE artist_id = 1;
UPDATE Artworks SET genre = 'Impressionism' WHERE artist_id = 1 AND creation_year = 1889;
UPDATE Artists SET country='Italy' WHERE artist_id=1;
UPDATE Artworks SET genre='Modern Art' WHERE artwork_id=5;
UPDATE Artists SET nationality='French', bio='Renowned painter from France' WHERE artist_id=1;
UPDATE Artworks SET price=500.00, description='Beautiful landscape painting' WHERE artist_id=3 AND artwork_name='Sunset' OR year_created=2021;
UPDATE Artists SET nationality = 'French', bio = 'French artist known for his surreal artworks' WHERE artist_id = 1
UPDATE Artworks SET price = 5000.00, medium = 'Oil on Canvas' WHERE artist_id = 2
